sqlMap.select: SELECT ID FROM IDOCXNEXTID WHERE TYPE=3 AND PARENTID= #value#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE IDOCXNEXTID SET ID = ID + 1 WHERE TYPE = 3 AND PARENTID = #value#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO A$idDestinationBook$SF (FDRID ,TIMESTAMP,FLD1,FLD2,FLD3,FLD4,FLD5,FLD6,FLD7,FLD8,FLD9,FLD10,FLD11,FLD12, FLD13,FLD14,FLD15,FLD16,FLD17,FLD19,FLD20,FLD503,FLD504,FLD505,FLD506) SELECT $idDestinationRegister$ AS FDRID ,TIMESTAMP,FLD1,FLD2,FLD3,FLD4,FLD5,FLD6,FLD7, FLD8,FLD9,FLD10,FLD11,FLD12,FLD13,FLD14,FLD15,FLD16,FLD17,FLD19,FLD20,FLD503, FLD504,FLD505,FLD506 FROM A$idOriginBook$SF WHERE FDRID=#idOriginRegister#

INSERT INTO A$idDestinationBook$FDRH (ID,VERSTAT,REFCOUNT,ACCESSTYPE,ACSID,CRTRID,CRTNDATE,UPDRID,UPDDATE,ACCRID,ACCDATE,ACCCOUNT) SELECT $idDestinationRegister$ AS ID,VERSTAT,REFCOUNT,ACCESSTYPE,ACSID,CRTRID,CRTNDATE,UPDRID, UPDDATE,ACCRID,ACCDATE,ACCCOUNT FROM A$idOriginBook$FDRH WHERE ID=#idOriginRegister#
sqlMap.select: SELECT ID FROM A$idOriginBook$DOCH WHERE FDRID=#idOriginRegister# ORDER BY ID
SELECT ID FROM IDOCXNEXTID WHERE TYPE=7 AND PARENTID= #value#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE IDOCXNEXTID SET ID = ID + 1 WHERE TYPE = 7 AND PARENTID = #value#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO A$idDestinationBook$DOCH (ID,FDRID, ARCHID, NAME,CLFID,TYPE,TITLE,AUTHOR,KEYWORDS,STAT,REFCOUNT,REMARKS,ACCESSTYPE, ACSID,CRTRID,CRTNDATE,UPDRID,UPDDATE,ACCRID,ACCDATE,ACCCOUNT,TIMESTAMP) SELECT $idDocDestination$ AS ID, $idDestinationRegister$ AS FDRID, $idDestinationBook$ AS ARCHID, NAME,CLFID,TYPE,TITLE,AUTHOR,KEYWORDS,STAT,REFCOUNT,REMARKS,ACCESSTYPE, ACSID,CRTRID,CRTNDATE,UPDRID,UPDDATE,ACCRID,ACCDATE,ACCCOUNT,TIMESTAMP FROM A$idOriginBook$DOCH WHERE ID=#idDocOrigin#

INSERT INTO A$idDestinationBook$PAGEH (ID,FDRID,NAME,SORTORDER,DOCID,FILEID,VOLID,LOC,ANNID,STAT,REFCOUNT, REMARKS,ACCESSTYPE,ACSID,CRTRID,CRTNDATE,UPDRID,UPDDATE,ACCRID,ACCDATE,ACCCOUNT) SELECT ID, $idDestinationRegister$ AS FDRID ,NAME,SORTORDER, $idDocDestination$ AS DOCID, FILEID,VOLID,LOC,ANNID,STAT,REFCOUNT, REMARKS,ACCESSTYPE,ACSID,CRTRID,CRTNDATE,UPDRID, UPDDATE,ACCRID,ACCDATE,ACCCOUNT FROM A$idOriginBook$PAGEH WHERE DOCID=#idDocOrigin#
sqlMap.select: SELECT ID, FDRID, NAME, DOCID, CRTNDATE, LOC, FILEID, VOLID FROM A$idOriginBook$PAGEH WHERE DOCID=#idDocOrigin#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE IVOLFILEHDR SET EXTID1 = #idDestinationBook#, EXTID2 = #idDestinationRegister#, EXTID3 = #idDocDestination# WHERE ID = #idPagVol#
UPDATE SCR_PAGEREPOSITORY SET BOOKID = #idDestinationBook#, FDRID = #idDestinationRegister# WHERE DOCUID = #idPagVol#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO SCR_PAGEINFO (BOOKID, REGID, PAGEID, HASHVERSION, HASH) SELECT $idDestinationBook$ AS BOOKID, $idDestinationRegister$ AS REGID, PAGEID, HASHVERSION, HASH FROM SCR_PAGEINFO WHERE BOOKID = #idOriginBook# AND REGID = #idOriginRegister#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM SCR_PAGEINFO WHERE BOOKID = #idOriginBook# AND REGID = #idOriginRegister#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO A$idDestinationBook$XNID (TYPE,PARENTID,ID) SELECT TYPE, $idDestinationRegister$, ID FROM A$idOriginBook$XNID WHERE PARENTID=#idOriginRegister#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE SCR_MODIFREG SET ID_ARCH = #idDestinationBook# WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 'S' FROM A$idOriginBook$SF WHERE NUM_REG=FLD1 AND FDRID = #idOriginRegister#)
UPDATE SCR_REGINT SET ID_ARCH = #idDestinationBook#, ID_FDR = #idDestinationRegister# WHERE ID_ARCH = #idOriginBook# AND ID_FDR = #idOriginRegister#
UPDATE SCR_EXREG_IN SET ID_ARCH = #idDestinationBook#, ID_FDR = #idDestinationRegister# WHERE ID_ARCH = #idOriginBook# AND ID_FDR = #idOriginRegister#
sqlMap.select: SELECT ID FROM A$idOriginBook$XF WHERE FDRID=#idOriginRegister# ORDER BY ID
SELECT ID FROM IDOCXNEXTID WHERE TYPE=5 AND PARENTID= #value#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE IDOCXNEXTID SET ID = ID + 1 WHERE TYPE = 5 AND PARENTID = #value#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO A$idDestinationBook$XF (ID,FDRID,FLDID,TEXT,TIMESTAMP) SELECT $idExtDestination$, $idDestinationRegister$, FLDID,TEXT, TIMESTAMP FROM A$idOriginBook$XF WHERE ID=#idExtOrigin#
